chapters.title: Chapter 24:  Honey in the Tea
chapters.info: Pedra, p. 519—Short, serious-faced Accepted. She guided Egwene to her room on her first day in Tar Valon. She is a short, wiry woman, slightly older than Nynaeve. She seemed unpromising at first, but now Pevara thinks she will be raised to the shawl soon. She teaches classes to Coride now.
